Class AdventureCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.card.AdventureCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbandonedShip, AbandonedStation, Enemies, Epidemic, FreeSpace, MeteoriteStorm, Planets, Stardust, WarField
public abstract class AdventureCard extends Object

  • Field Details

    • cardName

      protected String cardName
      Represents the name of the AdventureCard. This field stores the unique identifier or name associated with the card, which may be used for identification, display, or game-related operations.

    • level

      protected int level
      Represents the level of the adventure card, which can be used to determine its rank, difficulty, or progression step within the game's logic.

    • currState

      protected CardState currState
      Represents the current state of the AdventureCard in its lifecycle. The state defines what action or phase the card is in during the game. This variable is an instance of the CardState enumeration, which contains various possible states such as START_CARD, CHOOSE_CANNONS, EPIDEMIC, END_OF_CARD, and more. This variable is intended to be modified by the card's state transitions during gameplay. The current state influences the behavior of the card and the available actions for the player. The currState serves as a key to control the flow of gameplay related to this AdventureCard.

    • gameModel

      protected GameModel gameModel
      Represents the game model associated with the AdventureCard. This variable links the card to the broader game logic and state, providing necessary context and integration with the overall game functionality.

    • imageName

      protected String imageName
      The name of the image associated with this AdventureCard. This variable holds the filename or unique identifier for the image representation that can be displayed in the game's user interface or other visual elements.

    • isTestFlightCard

      protected boolean isTestFlightCard
      Indicates whether the AdventureCard is designated as a test flight card. This boolean flag can be used to differentiate specific functionality or characteristics associated with test flight cards.

    • meteoriteCreator

      protected static Map<String,Callable<Meteorite>> meteoriteCreator
      A static map that associates string identifiers with factory functions for creating specific types of Meteorite objects.

      This is used by cards that contain meteorites, allowing them to dynamically instantiate the appropriate meteorite object based on a given ID (e.g., "big_north").

    • shotCreator

      protected static Map<String,Callable<Shot>> shotCreator
      A static map that associates string identifiers with factory functions for creating specific types of Shot objects.

      This is used by cards that involve shots, allowing them to dynamically instantiate the correct shot object based on a given ID (e.g., "small_east").

      Sets the name of the image associated with this AdventureCard.

      public String getImageName()
      Retrieves the name of the image associated with the card.
      Returns:
      the name of the image as a String

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel(int level)
      Sets the level of the AdventureCard.
      Parameters:
      level - the new level to be set for the AdventureCard

    • getCardName

      public String getCardName()
      Retrieves the name of the card.
      Returns:
      the card name as a String

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Retrieves the level of the AdventureCard.
      Returns:
      the current level of the card

    • isTestFlightCard

      public boolean isTestFlightCard()
      Determines if the card is a Test Flight card.
      Returns:
      true if the card is a Test Flight card, false otherwise.

    • setIsTestFlightCard

      public void setIsTestFlightCard(boolean testFlightCard)
      Sets the flag indicating whether this card is a Test Flight card.
      Parameters:
      testFlightCard - a boolean value representing whether the card is a Test Flight card. True if it is; false otherwise.

    • getFirstState

      public abstract CardState getFirstState()
      Retrieves the first state of the card.
      Returns:
      the initial CardState of the card.

    • setCurrState

      public void setCurrState(CardState currState)
      Updates the current state of the card and notifies all connected clients about the state change.
      Parameters:
      currState - the new state to set for this card.

    • getCurrState

      public CardState getCurrState()
      Retrieves the current state of the card.
      Returns:
      the current state of the card as an instance of CardState.

    • setGame

      public void setGame(GameModel gameModel)
      Sets the game model for this instance.
      Parameters:
      gameModel - the GameModel object to be set

    • play

      public abstract void play(PlayerChoicesDataStructure playerChoices) throws UnknownStateException
      Executes the gameplay logic associated with this AdventureCard. The specific implementation of the gameplay will depend on the subclass and its unique behavior.
      Parameters:
      playerChoices - the data structure containing the player's choices and interactions necessary for executing the card's gameplay logic.
      Throws:
      UnknownStateException - if the card's current state cannot be determined or is invalid during the execution of the method.

    • toClientCard

      public abstract ClientCard toClientCard()
      Converts the current instance of an AdventureCard into its corresponding ClientCard representation. This method is intended to provide a client-side representation of the AdventureCard, including necessary details for rendering or interacting with the card in a user interface.
      Returns:
      a ClientCard instance representing the client-side equivalent of the current AdventureCard.

    • setCardName

      public void setCardName(String cardName)
      Sets the name of the card.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the name to set for the card
